Class GenericGamePiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • Piece
      • GenericGamePiece

  • public class GenericGamePiece
extends Piece
    Superclass for all types of game pieces.
    Author:
    calix

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericGamePiece

        public GenericGamePiece(double x,
                        double y,
                        double radius,
                        int value)
        Instantiates a GenericGamePiece with default color (black)
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x position
        y - the initial y position
        radius - the radius of the GenericGamePiece
        value - the value of the GenericGamePiece (points)

      • GenericGamePiece

        public GenericGamePiece(double x,
                        double y,
                        double radius,
                        int value,
                        int R,
                        int G,
                        int B)
        Instantiates a GenericGamePiece with color values passed in.
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x position
        y - the initial y position
        radius - the radius of the GenericGamePiece
        value - the value of the GenericGamePiece (points)
        R - the R value of RGB, 0-255 inclusive.
        G - the G value of RGB, 0-255 inclusive.
        B - the B value of RGB, 0-255 inclusive.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public int score(double minX,
                 double minY,
                 double maxX,
                 double maxY,
                 double radius)
        This method checks if the GenericGamePiece should be scored, and if so, returns the value. Else, return 0.
        Specified by:
        score in class Piece
        Parameters:
        minX - left boundary of the board
        minY - top boundary of the board
        maxX - right boundary of the board
        maxY - bottom boundary of the board
        radius - the radius of the holes in the corner to score in
        Returns:
        the score that the piece should receive at its current position in the board.

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns:
        the point value of this piece
